meanings.definition: Members of a small independent group taking part in irregular fighting, typically against larger regular forces.
meanings.sent1: The guerillas hid in the forest, planning their next move.
meanings.sent2: The guerillas launched a surprise attack on the enemy camp.
meanings.sent3: The guerillas played a prank on the soldiers by hiding their supplies.
meanings.sent4: The guerillas' tactics were as unpredictable as the wind.
meanings.sent5: The image of the guerillas sneaking through the night stayed with him.

meanings.definition: A form of warfare in which a small group of combatants use military tactics such as ambushes, sabotage, and hit-and-run attacks.
meanings.sent1: The guerillas set up traps along the enemy's path.
meanings.sent2: The guerillas' strategy involved quick strikes and retreats.
meanings.sent3: The guerillas jokingly challenged each other to a game of hide-and-seek.
meanings.sent4: The guerillas' movements were like shadows in the night.
meanings.sent5: The memory of the guerillas' ambush haunted the soldiers.
